title: A Perfect Fit
description: Romance bites, the perfect appetiser.  An 11,000 word short story.  When Piper discovers her own fake profile on a popular dating site, she is mortified. Things only get worse when well-known relationship blogger Sage Costello features Piper on her blog. Determined to prove she is not the ‘player’ Sage claims she is, Piper challenges Sage to go on a date.  That was how things started, but how Piper feels after meeting Sage is a different matter altogether…
author: Jade Winters
